Description: East Greek pottery plate, restored from seven fragments and plaster. Bands on outside and on underside of foot; hook maeander band on top of rim; on floor, hook maeander band, between bands, surrounds large rosette in tondo. One pair of suspension holes on rim.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1049)
